name: dvyb-chrome-extension
description: Save ads from Meta Ad Library to DVYB

scripts.build:production: DVYB_API_BASE=https://api.dvyb.com DVYB_FRONTEND_URL=https://app.dvyb.com node scripts/generate-manifest.js && DVYB_API_BASE=https://api.dvyb.com DVYB_FRONTEND_URL=https://app.dvyb.com webpack --mode production
